about_the_game:
This playtest is an extremely early version focused on testing basic movement and feel. There’s no combat yet, no full levels, and a lot of things are missing, but your feedback will help shape the game’s foundation.

What to Expect in This Playtest:

✔ A small, unfinished test level – Experimenting with movement, physics, and interactions.
✔ Various mechanics in progress – Some elements may feel incomplete or temporary.
✔ Focus on movement fine-tuning – Jumping, rolling, climbing, and basic platforming.

What’s NOT in the Playtest (Yet!):

✖ No combat – Panda still thinks he’s just playing.
✖ No real objectives – It’s mostly about testing movement.
✖ No polished level design – This is just a testbed for mechanics.

💡 Your feedback matters! If you see potential and enjoy testing movement mechanics, your input will help refine the core gameplay. Just keep in mind that this is an early playtest, and many things are still in the works! 

📢 Leave Feedback in the Very Aggressive Adventure Discussions Forum

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of intense violence, dark humor, and suggestive themes. The game includes cartoonish but graphic depictions of harm and chaotic destruction, with elements of exaggerated aggression. While the game remains humorous and lighthearted in tone, some players may find these themes unsettling. There are no depictions of sexual assault, drug use, or self-harm.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3+ compatible GPU (e.g., NVIDIA GTX 960)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13+ (High Sierra or later)
  • Processor: Intel Only, runs via Rosetta on Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-compatible GPU (e.g., Radeon Pro 555X)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A fast-paced platformer where Panda just wants to play—but right now, it's all about movement. Run, jump, and roll through an early test level focused on fine-tuning platforming mechanics. No combat yet, just physics, movement, and chaos in the making!
